channel.title: Blood Harvest
channel.description: Blood Harvest was downloaded to L4D2. I’m receiving some really bad (unfinished) graphics in the outdoor sky. Anyone else getting this? I find this hard to believe from Valve. Looks like some half ass thrown together mod.

item.title: Blood Harvest
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
Kaweebo:

It was? I thought only Dead Air. Better add this to my ‘to do’ list.

Anyway, have you checked your graphics settings? Maybe the texture setting is set to low.

IT WORKED! The shader and texture settings were too low. Go figure. I never thought to do that because I’ve never had that problem before. But it took right off as soon as I tweeked it up a little. THANKS Kaweebo.

Read full topic
